title: Makro Vega
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Mediterranean, Juice bar, Take-out, European, Croatian
description: Vegetarian restaurant operating since the mid-2000s. Offers daily changing menu with both vegetarian and vegan food. Has vegan desserts and tea. Situated in old town, take 1st right turn from Krizeva. The owners also operate Upcafe.
